component.name: D050000L
component.summary: An alternative font for ITC Zapf Dingbats typeface

description.p: This dingbats font is an alternative for the ITC Zapf Dingbats typeface, and is part of Level 2 Core Font Set - PostScript specification of 35 base fonts that can be used with any PostScript file.
These 35 base fonts are provided freely by (URW++) company, and are mainly utilized by Ghostscript, or other applications using it.
